landing.title: Welcome to PassKey App
landing.subtitle: PassKey is a secure application designed to manage and store passkeys securely. It features a simple login system and allows users to create, store, and access passkeys securely using a passkey-based authentication mechanism.
landing.check-if-passkey-supported: Click on button to check compatibility
